2020.context: SoFi Technologies, Inc. is a digital financial services company focused on lending, banking, investing, and financial products. SPAC merger. Digital bank and lending platform.

competitors.notes: Consumer banking and personal loans

2024.context: SoFi Technologies, Inc. is a digital financial services company focused on lending, banking, investing, and financial products. Banking charter success. Galileo B2B platform.

competitors.notes: Investing app expanding into banking and credit

competitors.name: Chime
competitors.notes: Leading neobank with 38M+ customers

competitors.notes: Consumer banking though scaling back
